programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2
programme.desc: Dynamic cop duo, Mel Gibson and Danny Glover, returns for more hard-hitting action in this second installment of the action adventure!

programme.title: Corrective Measures
programme.desc: In the worlds most dangerous maximum security prison filled with supervillain inmates and corrupt staff, tensions rise leading to anarchy and destruction.

programme.title: The Hunted
programme.desc: A suspense-thriller about an ex-military survivalist expert who teams up with an FBI agent to track and hunt down a trained assassin.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Set in the year 2084, a man goes to Mars via a memory implant and discovers the truth about himself.

programme.title: The Racer
programme.desc: In what will likely be his last Tour de France, a seasoned support rider is forced to face his demons and his desire to taste victory.

programme.title: Code Of Honor
programme.desc: After his family is murdered, a Special Ops operative becomes a vigilante. His former protege, now an FBI agent, must stop him before mobsters and police close in.

programme.title: Batman vs. Teenage Mutant Ninja...
programme.sub-title: Batman vs. Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When a new menace begins stealing all experimental technology, Batman is put on high alert.

programme.title: Lady Bloodfight
programme.desc: Upon arriving in Hong Kong, an American woman is beaten up and mugged by thugs. Shes taken in by a martial arts master who trains her for a fight competition known as the Kumite.

programme.title: Lock Up
programme.desc: With only six months left of his sentence, inmate Frank Leone is transferred from a minimum security prison to a maximum security prison by a vindictive warden.

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson stars in this high-octane adventure set in the deep ocean as man-made sharks turn the tables on their creators.

programme.title: Knight And Day
programme.desc: A young woman gets mixed up with a disgraced spy who is trying to clear his name.
